headline: A moment of Suicidal Ideation
description: A raw and unfiltered entry capturing a moment of suicidal ideation through both words and a stark drawing. The post reflects the 'Pale Moon Full' phaseâ€”marked by mournful clarity and an unflinching awareness of emotional weight. It documents the confrontation with hopelessness while holding a distant, reflective stance, translating inner pain into symbolic imagery.

motifMap.meaning: chaotic mental torment or intrusive thoughts

associatedMedia.description: A photograph of a notebook page featuring a stick-figure drawing confronting a chaotic, scribbled face, with fragmented handwritten text expressing hopelessness.
